Text: Yo thank you for putting this up I have no cable anymore and was hopping that someone nice would put up this one so plzzz!!! keep them coming =]

Thanks so much!  My regular guy hasn't been uploading the new ones for some reason. 

Though I have to say, I'm very disappointed in the direction Bleach has gone.  They left soooo many questions unanswered from the Heuco Mondo storyline.
